28.text: Hello. There are eight places in the quarter-final stage of this

32.text: competition, and six of them have already been taken.

35.text: The seventh will go to whichever team wins tonight.

40.text: The team from Nottingham University won their first round match, albeit

44.text: in a somewhat low-scoring fixture against the University of Swansea,

47.text: and at the gong were ahead by 135 points to 110.

55.text: away from the bonus questions for a good 15 minutes.

57.text: And they knew their stuff on HMS Beagle,

59.text: the Book of Proverbs, Mendelssohn, poitin and plum brandy.
